synopsis.text: He ir to a renowned family of exorcists, You Keika finds himself impoverished after the loss of his parents. To make ends meet, he resorts to fortune-telling on the streets and part-time computer repair jobs. One fateful night, he crosses paths with the enigmatic and captivating exorcist, Tanmoku Ki, who is engaged in battle with a malevolent spirit in a junkyard. In an unfortunate twist of fate, Keika is struck by a car and transformed into a ghost. It is then that the dashing Tanmoku Ki proposes a "pact" to Keika, urging him to join forces and combat evil spirits together. Thus, the journey of our heroes and their unique friendship begins!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
